name: Hawaiian Skunk
description: Hawaiian Skunk is an outdoor plant that offers high THC content (evidenced by dense crystals) with few growing difficulties. A cross between Hawaiian Indica and Skunk #1, this light green, poppy bud suggests the uplifting, sativa-dominant buzz it induces. The strain is commonly praised for its smell that borders between fruity and musky thanks to its balanced genetics.
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Creative, Energetic, Depression, Nausea, Stress, Headaches, Lack of Appetite, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dizzy, Headache
